member.name: T:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IModule
member.summary: Interface for late-bound modules loaded at runtime.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IModule.Start
member.summary: Starts the module.
member.returns: If an asynchronous start operation has been started, a wait handle is returned. This wait handle can be used to wait for the asynchronous process to finish. If no such asynchronous operation has been started, null can be returned.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IModule.Stop
member.summary: Stops the module.

member.summary: Interface for detecting interfaces supporting objects with predefined features.
member.typeparam: Type defining features to look for.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IProcessingSupport`1.Supports(`0)
member.summary: If the interface understands objects such as .
member.returns: How well objects of this type are supported.

member.name: T:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types
member.summary: Static class that dynamically manages types and interfaces available in the runtime environment.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a type, given its full name.
member.returns: Type, if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.IsType(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if references a type in the inventory.
member.returns: If references a type.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetTypesImplementingInterface(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all types implementing a given interface.
member.returns: Types implementing the interface.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetTypesImplementingInterface(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets all types implementing a given interface.
member.returns: Types implementing the interface.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetTypesInNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all types in a namespace. (Types in sub-namespaces are not included.)
member.returns: Types in the namespace.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetFirstAssemblyReferenceInNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the assembly reference of the first type found in a namespace.
member.returns: Assembly reference of first type found in a namespace. If no such type was found, null is returned.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetRootNamespaces
member.summary: Gets an array of root namespaces.
member.returns: Array of root namespaces.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.IsRootNamespace(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a name is a root namespace.
member.returns: If the name is a root namespace.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.GetSubNamespaces(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an array of sub-namespaces to a given namespace.
member.returns: Array of sub-namespaces.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.IsSubNamespace(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a local name in represents a subnamespace from the point of view of the namespace in .
member.returns: If the local name represents a subnamespace.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.TryGetQualifiedNames(System.String,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Gets an array (possibly null) of qualified names relating to an unqualified name.
member.param: Array of qualified names (null if none)
member.returns: If the unqualified name was recognized.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.Invalidate
member.summary: Invalidates type caches. This method should be called after having loaded assemblies dynamically, to make sure any types, interfaces and namespaces in the newly loaded assemblies are included.

member.name: E:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.OnInvalidated
member.summary: Event raised when the type cache has been invalidated. Can be used by code that themselves cache results and need to be updated after new types are available.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.StopAllModules
member.summary: Stops all modules.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.StopAllModules(System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IModule})
member.summary: Stops all modules.
member.param: Order in which modules should be stopped. Default order is the reverse starting order, if no other order is provided.

member.name: P:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.Modules
member.summary: Loaded modules.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.StartAllModules(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts all loaded modules.
member.returns: If all modules have been successfully started (true), or if at least one has not been started within the time period defined by .

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.StartAllModules(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{Waher.Runtime.Inventory.IModule})
member.summary: Starts all loaded modules.
member.param: Order in which modules should be started.
member.returns: If all modules have been successfully started (true), or if at least one has not been started within the time period defined by .

member.name: P:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.NoTypes
member.summary: Contains an empty array of types.

member.name: P:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.NoParameters
member.summary: Contains an empty array of parameter values.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.SetModuleParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a module parameter. This parameter value will be accessible to modules when they are loaded.
member.exception: If a module parameter with the same name is already defined.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.TryGetModuleParameter(System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Tries to get a module parameter value.
member.returns: If a module parameter with the same name was found.

member.name: P:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.IsInitialized
member.summary: If the inventory has been initialized.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.Initialize(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Initializes the inventory engine, registering types and interfaces available in .

member.name: P:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.Assemblies
member.summary: Assemblies in the inventory.

member.summary: Creates an object of a given type, given its full name.
member.param: Parameters to pass on to the constructor.
member.returns: Created object.
member.exception: If no type with the given name exists.

member.summary: Gets a property value (or field value) from an object.
member.returns: Property (or field) value.
member.exception: If there is no property or field with the given name.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Inventory.Types.SetProperty(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a property value (or field value) in an object.
member.exception: If there is no property or field with the given name.

member.summary: Calls a method on an object.
member.param: Arguments to pass on to method.
member.returns: Result
member.exception: If there is no method with the given name and argument types.

member.summary: Calls a static method on a class.
member.param: Arguments to pass on to method.
member.returns: Result
member.exception: If there is no method with the given name and argument types.

member.summary: Finds the best interface for a certain task.

member.returns: Best interface, if found, null otherwise.

member.summary: Finds the best interface for a certain task.
